column4: My favorite is the holy trinity: Soma, Xanax, and Oxycontin.

I knew that's what it was gonna be when I clicked on it.
Also, a mickey Finn is supposed to be nice...if you manage to remember it
Fuck off..I deleted it. I swear I always see you being a jerk to any person asking questions on here! 🙄😡🖕🏼
How was I being a jerk?

Instead of giving me an answer, or asking me to better clarify what I meant to ask, you had to make a snarky “ummmm” as tho you’re implying something, but don’t wanna I’ve an answer. I don’t deal with people being assholes or making a person look silly, instead of simply answering a question that’s being asked, from someone who’s legitimately just trying to understand..

And it isn’t the first time I’ve seen you being snarky or sarcastic to someone asking a question. A lot of things might be obvious to you, but to the people asking questions  about things that may be obvious to you or I, it isn’t to that particular  person. Be respectful! A LOT of people come here as a refuge to ask questions without feeling judged and made a fool of!!! Respect that. 👌🏼👌🏼👌🏼

Whoa, there bud. It's not that big of deal, my sole, initial point was that your now deleted post would be cleared up reading the first line of his link. I'll bet that no matter how I had told you exactly that, you'd have had the same overreaction.
